title: Drawing, "Textile or Wallpaper Floral Pattern"
description:
1956-47-160a  The present top sheet features a pattern of repeating flowers comprised of three white dots and a pair of curved leaves, one purple and one black. Handwritten directions for color appear below, beige background on the left and not purple on the right. 

1956-47-160b  A green rectangle, formed by closely placed lines on the bottom sheet, comprises the background on the present bottom sheet, visible through the top one.
